thread.section_title: Bay Alarm Medical Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bay Alarm Medical | www.bayalarmmedical.com
thread.title: Patricia Fischer
thread.title_full: Bay Alarm Medical reviewed by Patricia Fischer

author: Patricia Fischer
title: Patricia Fischer
text: It was a fall by my handicap husband taking me down with him that convinced us it was time for a home alert system. Needed help with initial setup and 1 call to customer service had us up and running. Customer service was extremely helpful and friendly. We push the alarm once a month to test the system and the response is always fast and friendly. Don't know why we waited so long to sign up.
